DOC.brief_summary: This study will compare two strategies for bowel cleansing prior to inpatient colonoscopy: the entire preparation taken the night before the procedure versus half the preparation taken the night before the procedure, and the other half taken the morning of the procedure.
DOC.criteria: any diagnosis for which colonoscopy is indicated ileus severe colitis/toxic megacolon gastric retention bowel perforation gastrointestinal obstruction gastroparesis that precludes oral bowel preparation pregnant or lactating women allergy to polyethylene glycol. unable to give consent
